commits.msg:
Initial commit of Kafka Puppet module for Apache Kafka 0.8

Change-Id: Ibfa23af7c61dc5f1b5176c92a835460646d6bd26

Adding custom Zookeeper chroot support.

Change-Id: Ia3e34bfa7f836b2f7add5e9259bd4b5ac397df8b

Updating comments for $zookeeper_chroot.  Supporting array for $log_dir

Change-Id: I652c70410d993323ecc6197741ebc70c0d7248da

Matching kafka.default.erb with updated /etc/default/kafka in latest 0.8 deb.

Now supporting $heap_opts for configuring min and max JVM heap sizes

Change-Id: I946fecf9f8f177b7c9a3648834dd9652a8d273a0

Supporting arbitrary Kafka metrics_properties, rather than only the Kafka CSV metrics reporter.

Change-Id: I5c3fbfd931475f2a6c73a5cf142797da82691005

Refactoring kafka::server and adding kafka::mirror support.

Recent builds of the 0.8 package do not include client configs
or commands that use client configs by default.  This makes it
mostly useless to try to configure consumer and producer property files
for Kafka client setup.  Installing the kafka package is enough,
as the /usr/sbin/kafka client commands take in a full list of
CLI opts, rather than relying on property files.

More likely, you are puppetizing a Kafka Broker.  kafka::server
has been slightly refactored with some of the required parameters
that were previously on the base kafka class.

Kafka MirrorMaker daemons can now be puppetized.  Use the kafka::mirror
class in conjunction with one or more kafka::mirror::consumer defines.
See README.md for more info.

Change-Id: Ic3d1eb24ca645e582c0d836e0a03c12541072ba8

Adding kafka::server::jmxtrans support for jmxtrans Kafka broker metrics

Change-Id: I0896eed96492efb1da438d1a260f14aa9dab9bc3

Fixing up Kafka object queries.  Many MBeans had to include escaped double quotes.

Change-Id: I9154271abbb5373d3edccf5b257f330209508eb6

Cleaning up kafka::server::jmxtrans and adding some more metrics

Change-Id: I56e53b99e6daf6d21d2729dc98158f883140bcfa

Being consistent with ISRExpands capitalization in jmxtrans resultAlias

Change-Id: I5dea2aebcaa41a94306cb9b64a337a5773e87211

Adding auto_create_topics_enable parameter

Also adding  documentation about heap_opts

Change-Id: Iee8f0117e9d5c170a747729e0e75471948366d09

Using more frequent run_interval and log_level of info for jmxtrans

Change-Id: Ib643260c2c097fd8d47ea375ff988b57d4fdb2f7

Adding parameterization for open file descriptor ulimit

Change-Id: I0029d48f593117e71237ba11d403d4bb6b2769a9

Parameterizing num.replica.fetchers and replica.fetch.max.bytes

Change-Id: I1e8726a094fb930c8fc2b04687c24bb703d013c7

Adding more Kafka network request stats to jmxtrans monitoring

Also fixing resultAlias for FetchRequestPurgatory stats

Change-Id: I01b5f7b453a3d992fb197ad92aa6a4d0ba531f6c

Parameterizing 4 more replica server settings

Change-Id: I07e0c127f948aada1c7439e1bb379e1811cbd1fe

Default for log.flush.interval.ms has changed to 3000

Change-Id: I6a6f2003fec290e0864543855f8fd5b336604eca

Change default num.network.threads and num.io.threads

These defaults have changed in later versions of Kafka.
num.io.threads now defaults to the number of configured $log_dirs.

Change-Id: I5df3c6a0c1501e5be402e4d2d7225f3c980fe11b

Set num.io.threads to configuration default

Change-Id: Ie4386cb78789f24f95380b3a65afdd388253d715

Allow specifying default replication factor

Change-Id: I2a735617be0bac356833eaa4ee6330a6b92d0eba

Parameterize jvm_performance_opts in order to modify GC settings

Change-Id: I5765b91f2e66090352faafab5ebfc3125b2be307

Parameterize zookeeper.session.timeout.ms

Also set zookeeper_connection_timeout_ms to proper configuration default

Change-Id: I20ed0ee2a7c18a523498db1239521a129743fc74

Small fixups

Fix kafka::server comment spacing

Use new-style variables in template

Change-Id: I75e03826adfe3b3423f575ac2cb6535232cdcd90

Add $java_home and $num_partitions parameters

Change-Id: I33ba6c628b94dcae4afed0baff327be800821107

Update for kafka 0.8.1.1-2 packaging

Change-Id: I31f2974e1e67a208896a6e07e8c657ea3e0517eb

Add java_opts option

Change-Id: I8dc008c791c8cda730c396069d506fcdb0d7b79b

server::jmxtrans: add namespacing option

Specifying $group_prefix will namespace metrics emitted by jmxtrans in
ganglia and graphite in the same manner as jmxtrans::metrics::jvm.

Change-Id: I7bdcdc13a94fda85a7c2b2c807d4a5227d2e40eb

Add option for extra classpath entries

Change-Id: I671527f349c8317e07b1a4ba67ee02d37d9913a4

Add statsd parameters to kafka::server::jmxtrans

Change-Id: I7618b0ecd195f64536153f9926edd2e2321bdc82

Send jvm stats to statsd as well

Change-Id: If2bc1ab7433aa26575fb15d7e0ce82f924c038ff

Set bucketType for gauge metrics for statsd usage

Change-Id: I2bdbcb4e69075a76320acd45752b23ee08b9e89b

Use bucketType 'g' for all Kafka jmxtrans metrics sent to statsd

None of these are the default statsd 'counter' type.

Change-Id: Id947b4dd9dba64eb44dcbd8096ef7e381de83512

Update JMX metrics names for Kafka 0.8.2+

JMX metrics names have changed in Kafka 0.8.2.  This updates
them to that.  If you are using an older version of Kafka and
need the old metric names, set legacy_jmx => true when you include
the kafka::server::jmxtrans class.

Bug: T106581
Change-Id: I39ac37125dd67f7f68502021f9b34eadc11b4b50

List ReplicaManager JMX Kafka metrics individually

Change-Id: I698441291a9ce48a61a04522fb27886a343532f8

Add param for auto.leader.rebalance.enable

Change-Id: I3981f51d45b2b9e6422f50f6892d46d1c0c97005

Puppetize systemd override for Kafka LimitNOFILE

/etc/default/kafka's KAFKA_NOFILES_ULIMIT is not useable
by the systemd service file installed by the latest WMF
Kafka package, so we need to puppetized a custom systemd
override file to set this.

Bug: T106581
Change-Id: I10f41d0d3a19b15374ded800f0d6cd12573c9fa9
There is no specific kafka-common package, so just use the kafka package
We don't have a separate kafka-server package, so we don't need to ensure a new package
Change file locations to /opt, since that is where we install kafka.  Create symlink from /etc/kafka to /opt/kafka for ease of use, though
Change all references of kafka-server to kafka, since that is what the package is named
Actually use the $kafka_enabled variable
Add the ability to create base directories for the log dirs

Change broker id assignment from fqdn to hostname.  TODO: Make this
configurable in the future
